epoch.title: Summer 2006
epoch.name: Summer 2006
epoch.description: Alex starts to film Marble Hornets in CollegeTown

epoch.title: Season 1 begins
epoch.description: Jay is reminded about the operator by a post of SomethingAwful and starts to post videos

epoch.title: Seven month gap
epoch.description: Jay's memory of this period was erased

epoch.title: Season 2 begins
epoch.description: Jay starts to upload footage again

epoch.title: Season 3 begins
epoch.description: Jay starts to upload footage again

video.title: Introduction
video.player_summary: Introduction to the series.

scene.description: Jay introduces his youtube channel.

video.title: Entry #1
video.player_summary: Alex sees the Operator outside his house.

scene.description: Alex sees the operator outside his house.

video.title: Entry #2
video.player_summary: Alex is driving to a lamppost.

scene.description: Alex talks about the operator as he drives.

video.title: Entry #3
video.player_summary: Alex is constantly filming himself.

scene.description: Alex obsessively films himself.

video.title: Entry #4
video.player_summary: Alex chases the Operator around a playground. Sound is disabled.

scene.description: Alex chases the operator around the playground.

video.title: Entry #5
video.player_summary: Alex and Jay go location scouting.

scene.description: Alex and Jay go location scouting at the gazebo.
Alex and Jay go location scouting at the red tower.

video.title: Entry #6
video.player_summary: The Operator is stalking Alex outside his house.

scene.description: Alex films the operator outside his house.

video.title: Entry #7
video.player_summary: Alex and Brian are filming. The Operator shows up.

scene.description: Alex and Brian practice lines, and the operator turns up.

video.title: Entry #8
video.player_summary: Alex draws some things in charcoal.

scene.description: Alex draws on paper.

video.title: Entry #9
video.player_summary: Filming in the gazebo for Marble Hornets.

scene.description: The crew film a scene for Marble Hornets.

video.title: regards
video.player_summary: totheark introduce themselves to Jay.

scene.description: totheark leaves a cryptic message.

video.title: Entry #10
video.player_summary: Alex runs after or from the Operator. Sound is disabled.

scene.description: Alex runs from the operator.

video.title: operator
video.player_summary: totheark shares some audio.

scene.description: totheark leaves another cryptic message.

video.title: Entry #11
video.player_summary: Alex wakes up and searches for the Operator. He doesn't see it.

scene.description: Alex gets a visit from the operator.

video.title: Deluge
video.player_summary: 'Watching YOU'

scene.description: totheark leaves another cryptic message.

video.title: Entry #12
video.player_summary: Alex, Brian and Sarah(?) are filming. The Operator shows up.

scene.description: The crew film a scene and the operator watches.

video.title: Impurity
video.player_summary: A rainy day.

scene.description: totheark films a storm.

video.title: Entry #13
video.player_summary: Alex and Jay are filming. Alex chases the Operator around an old swimming pool.

scene.description: Alex and Jay are filming for Marble Hornets. Jay goes to the car to get another battery, while Alex sees the operator.

video.title: Exit
video.player_summary: Behind the scenes footage of Jay at Alex's car.

scene.description: totheark films Jay as he goes to the car.

video.title: Entry #14
video.player_summary: The Operator pays Alex a visit in his bedroom.

scene.description: The operator pays Alex a visit in his room.

video.title: Program
video.player_summary: bleed more

scene.description: totheark leaves another cryptic message.

video.title: Entry #15
video.player_summary: Jay asks Tim about his experiences filming Marble Hornets.

scene.description: Jay interviews TIm about Marble Hornets.

video.title: Advocate
video.player_summary: 'sit down'

scene.description: totheark recycles some old footage.

video.title: Entry #16
video.player_summary: Jay goes to the abandoned house for the first time.

scene.description: Jay explores Brian's old house at night.

video.title: Addition
video.player_summary: totheark films Jay at the house.

scene.description: totheark films Jay.

video.title: Entry #17
video.player_summary: Forgotten footage from Marble Hornets.

scene.description: The crew rehearse for a scene and the operator watches.

video.title: Signal
video.player_summary: A message from totheark using old movie footage.

scene.description: totheark replays an old movie.

video.title: Entry #18
video.player_summary: Jay returns the house and gets tackled by Masky.

scene.description: Jay returns to Brian's old house and is attacked by Masky. The operator may have been present.
Jay wakes up in his car after visiting Brian's house.

video.title: Entry #19
video.player_summary: Masky shows up in Jay's room. Jay disappears for a few hours.

scene.description: Jay goes to sleep and Masky shows up by his bedside. Jay and Maskt leave the room.

video.title: Messages
video.player_summary: 'Tell us. You have been keeping secrets. Smile for the camera.'

scene.description: totheark replays an old movie.

video.title: Return
video.player_summary: Footage and Jay and the Operator, getting close.

scene.description: Jay is prostrate on the floor as the operator walks past.

video.title: Entry #19.5
video.player_summary: Jay looks at the items he recovered in Entry #16.

scene.description: Jay goes through the objects he took from the house in Entry #16.

video.title: Entry #20
video.player_summary: Alex, Tim, Jay and the cameraperson go through a script reading.

scene.description: The crew are preparing for a scene. Tim arrives, feeling ill.

video.title: Version
video.player_summary: totheark draws attention to the red tower.

scene.description: totheark shows recycled footage of the tower.

video.title: Entry #21
video.player_summary: Jay recovers a tape from the tower.

scene.description: Jay returns to the Red Tower to find the tape containing Entry #22.

video.title: Entry #22
video.player_summary: Jay plays the tape from the red tower. Seth and Alex explore the basement of doom. Seth gets taken. Alex makes a confessional tape and promises to burn the tape.

scene.description: Alex and Seth explore the Basement. Seth gets attacked.
Alex confesses to the camera and plans to move away from the area. He says he is going to burn the tapes.

video.title: Attention
video.player_summary: More old movie footage. 'Return to us'.

scene.description: totheark asks Jay to return, using old movie footage

video.title: Admission
video.player_summary: totheark suggests another visit to the abandoned house. 'There are doors left unopened'.

scene.description: totheark shows the operator in Brian's house.

video.title: Entry #23
video.player_summary: Jay goes back to the abandoned house. The Operator teleports him to the basement of doom. Jay decides it's time to quit.

scene.description: Jay returns to Brian's house and is transported to the Basement.
Jay is in the basement and encounters the operator.
Jay wakes up in his house with a faulty camera.

video.title: Warning
video.player_summary: 'The following are footage excerpts from Alex Kralie'

scene.description: totheark gives yet another cryptic message.

video.title: Entry #24
video.player_summary: Jay is transported from his own house

scene.description: Jay is transported from his own house.

video.title: Entry ######
video.player_summary: 'We will wait for you no more. Control is being taken away from you.'

scene.description: 'We will wait for you no more. Control is being taken away from you.'

video.title: Entry #25
video.player_summary: Jay is staying in a hotel. His apartment building burns to the ground.

scene.description: Jay watches a news report of his apartment burning.

video.title: Entry #26
video.player_summary: Jay is about to give up, but just before he does a tape arrives. It shows footage of Alex and Amy, and their encounter with the Operator.

scene.description: Amy discovers Alex's old camera and the operator appears.
Jay announces he's ending the investigation (for real this time).
Jay receives the tape for Entry #26 in a package.

video.title: Entry #27
video.player_summary: Jay wakes up with a seven month memory gap.

scene.description: Jay wakes up to find himself in a strange hotel room.

video.title: Entry #28
video.player_summary: Jay finds a bag, a locked safe and meets Jessica.

scene.description: Jay takes stock of his situation in the Hotel. He finds his bag and a locked safe.
Jay meets Jessica.

video.title: Entry #29
video.player_summary: Jay finds footage of Alex running through the woods and to the tunnel.

scene.description: Controversial interpretation: Alex goes back to the Tunnel to find evidence of the murder of Bruce.

video.title: Entry #30
video.player_summary: Jay speaks to Jessica and the camera starts to malfunction around her. Strange noises come from her room.

scene.description: Jay talks to Jessica and they ask each other why they are at the hotel. Jessica seems to have memory loss.
Jay hears noises coming from Jessica's room at night.
Jay asks Jessica about the noises and she is reluctant to talk about it.

video.title: Entry #31
video.player_summary: Jay goes to the park and talks to a stranger. He returns to the hotel and asks Jessica some questions.

scene.description: Jay explores Rosswood, looking for the setting of Entry #29, and he comes across Rosswood Park.
Jay asks Jessica about Rosswood Park and gets caught lying. Both Jessica and Jay are suffering from memory loss.

video.title: Entry #32
video.player_summary: Jessica confesses some strange experiences to Jay.

scene.description: Jessica confronts Jay about his behaviour. They agree to talk in more detail and Jay stops the conversation to upload a video.

video.title: Entry #33
video.player_summary: Jessica goes missing and Jay gets chased out of the hotel.

scene.description: Jay goes to get Jessica, but finds that she has disappeared. He finds the combination to the safe and recovers the tapes. Masky chases him out of the Hotel.

video.title: Entry #34
video.player_summary: Jay follows the return address on the package to the burned out building.

scene.description: Jay drives to the return address on the package.
Jay looks around the burned house.

video.title: Entry #35
video.player_summary: Jay goes back to the burned out building and meets Alex. He is confronted with Masky, who is revealed to be Tim.

scene.description: Jay goes back to the old house, and finds Alex there. Masky is also there and attacks Alex, who retaliates.

video.title: Entry #36
video.player_summary: Jay and Alex drive home, and talk about their encounter with Tim.

scene.description: Jay and Alex talk about the encounter with Tim.

video.title: enttry 37
video.player_summary: Footage from one of Alex's early birthday parties.

scene.description: Alex celebrates an early birthday, and the operator visits.

video.title: Entry #38
video.player_summary: Alex and Jay walk through the woods. Alex tells a spooky ghost story.

scene.description: Jay and Alex are walking down a path and Alex tells Jay about the area.

video.title: Entry #39
video.player_summary: Jay is in his car and gets a phonecall from Alex. When he sleeps in his car a strange visitor walks by.

scene.description: Alex calls Jay and tells him to meet him at Rosswood Park the next day.
Somone walks past Jay's car as he sleeps.

video.title: Forecast
video.player_summary: Stock footage of a reanimated dog lung, followed by footage of Jay asleep in his car.

scene.description: totheark watches Jay sleep.

video.title: Entry #40
video.player_summary: Jay has a very close encounter with the Operator.

scene.description: Jay is waiting on Alex, goes for a walk in Rosswood Park, and encounters the operator. He abandons his camera.

video.title: Entry #41
video.player_summary: Jay's camera is returned to his car.

scene.description: Hoody return Jay's camera to his car.

video.title: Entry #42
video.player_summary: Alex and Jay meet after Jay\\\'s encounter with the Operator.

scene.description: Alex comes to meet Jay at Rosswood park.
Alex meets Jay and finds he has encountered the operator, and abandoned his camera. Jay finds his camera in his car.

video.title: Entry #43
video.player_summary: Jay and Alex look for Amy. Alex goes to Rosswood Park and approaches the Operator.

scene.description: Jay gets a call from Alex about finding Amy.
Alex drives Jay to Amy's apartment to look for her, then drives Jay home.
Alex goes to Rosswood Park where he approaches the operator.

video.title: Entry #44
video.player_summary: Alex summons the Operator to his home.

scene.description: Alex calls Jessica to tell her he found Amy. He then waits in his apartment.
The operator visits Alex.

video.title: Entry #45
video.player_summary: Hoody and Masky show up at Alex's house. He follows them to the woods where they attack him, until the Oprerator shows up.

scene.description: Alex is in his apartment, when he is interrupted by Hoody.
Alex chases Hoody who leads him to Masky. They attempt to kill Alex, but the operator intervenes.

video.title: Entry #46
video.player_summary: Jay breaks into Alex's house and the Operator shows up. As Jay flees his steals Alex's spare key.

scene.description: Jay breaks into Alex's apartment and tries to take a tape, but gets caught. The operator arrives and Jay flees, taking Alex's spare key as he does.

video.title: Entry #47
video.player_summary: Jay and Alex talk about the events of Entry #46. Jay gets Jessica's number from Alex. Jay calls Jessica.

scene.description: Alex and Jay argue about the break in. Alex says he no longer wants to help Jay. Jay gets Jesssica's phone number from Alex.
Jay calls Jessica and finds out that Alex told her that Amy has been found.

video.title: Entry #48
video.player_summary: Jay follows Alex through Rosswood Park to the tunnel.

scene.description: Jay follows Alex around.
Jay follows Alex to the Tunnel, then flees.

video.title: Entry #49
video.player_summary: Alex walks to the tunnel and kills a passerby.

scene.description: Alex kills an innocent passerby, Bruce.

video.title: Entry #50
video.player_summary: Alex leads Jay through the woods (leading to Entry #38.) Jay leaves while Alex remains in the woods. Masky leads Jay to the tunnel. Jay breaks into Alex's house again and takes a tape.

scene.description: Alex and Jay are in the woods, in a continuation of Entry #38. Jay leaves and Alex stays in the woods.
Masky leads Jay to the Tunnel. Jay tries to walk to the other side of the Tunnel, but the camera malfunctions.
Jay watches Alex leave his apartment, then breaks in with the spare key, and steals tape 56-42.

video.title: Entry #51
video.player_summary: Contents of the tape from Entry #50. Alex and Brian are filming Marble Hornets footage in the abandoned hospital. The Operator shows up and Alex disappears. Brian wakes up and searches the building, finding Tim. The Operator shows up again.

scene.description: Alex leads Brian to the Hospital to film some scenes. The operator appears on set.
Brian wakes up following an operator attack and searches for Alex. He finds Tim in his room, and the operator attacks again.
Alex drags Brian's body away and leaves the hospital.

video.title: Entry #52
video.player_summary: Alex leads Jay and Jessica to the barn where he pulls a gun on them. Masky turns up and stops Alex. Jay and Jessica go to a hotel where the Operator shows up. Jay wakes up after the encounter with no memory. Jay sees Tim downtown.

scene.description: Jay and Jessica meet, so that Alex can lead them somehwere.
Alex leads Jay and Jessica to the Barn where he pulls a gun. Masky tackles Alex and Jay and Jessica escape.
Jay and Jessica flee to the Hotel. Jay steals Alex's chestcam and harddrive. He hides the tapes in the safe, and takes the chestcam for himself.
Jay hears Jessica screaming and wakes up to find the operator there. He lunges at the operator which wipes his memory of the past 7 months.
Jay sees Tim acting normal downtown.

video.title: Fragments
video.player_summary: 'You are broken. You cannot be fixed.'

scene.description: totheark talks about Jay being broken.

video.title: Broadcast
video.player_summary: A mysterious underwater message.

scene.description: Some more strange footage.

video.title: Sidetone
video.player_summary: Alex's voicemail.

scene.description: Another cryptic message.

video.title: Intermission
video.player_summary: 'Did you see me? I saw you.'

scene.description: totheark points out (in sketches) that Hoody saw Jay.

video.title: Indicator
video.player_summary: 'Messages everywhere. Signs everywhere. You will never be free.'

scene.description: totheark defaces a doll.

video.title: Memories
video.player_summary: 'Years wasted. You've done nothing. So much more than time has been taken.'

scene.description: Footage of Alex's old apartment. It may have been footage from 2006.

video.title: Inquiry
video.player_summary: 'Look at you. You are who you are. You are you. But who are you?'

scene.description: More strange messages.

video.title: Classified
video.player_summary: Another creepy message from totheark. 'I saw it'.

scene.description: Another totheark video.

video.title: Sidenote
video.player_summary: totheark warns Jay about the tunnel incident. 'This is the best part'.

scene.description: totheark anticipates the next entry.

video.title: Extraction
video.player_summary: 'How much do you hate? It is not enough.'

scene.description: totheark asks about hate.

video.title: Entry #53
video.player_summary: Jay tracks down Tim via the antique shop. He approaches Tim outside his doctor's office and they exchange phone numbers.

scene.description: Jay looks at the antique shop and asks the owner about Tim.
Jay waits for Tim outside the Clinic and talks to him about Marble Hornets.
Tim calls Jay and agrees to give him some tapes.

video.title: Reminder
video.player_summary: totheark films Jay outside the antique shop. 'I have not forgotten.'

scene.description: totheark films Jay outside the Antique shop.

video.title: Entry #54
video.player_summary: Jay meets Tim and takes some tapes from him. The tapes contain footage of behind the scenes of the Marble Hornets crew. The Operator shows up in Tim's house.

scene.description: The crew run to Brian's house through the rain. All leave except Alex, Tim, and Brian. There's a powercut and the operator shows up.
Tim gives Jay some more tapes.

video.title: Decay
video.player_summary: totheark splices footage together. 'He will lead me to you. Lead me to death.'

scene.description: totheark recycles old footage.

video.title: Entry #55
video.player_summary: More behind the scenes footage of Marble Hornets. Tim tells Alex about the abandoned hospital. Tim calls his doctor and asks for an appointment.

scene.description: Alex, Brian and Tim are filming scenes for Marble Hornets. Tim mentions the Hospital to Alex as a possible location.

video.title: Entry #56
video.player_summary: Tim and Alex go to the abandoned hospital. Alex attacks Tim and the Operator makes an appearance.

scene.description: Alex and Tim go the Hospital for location scouting. Alex attacks Tim and the operator appears.

video.title: Entry #57
video.player_summary: Tim wakes up the hospital and makes his way to the annex. Alex is there with a steel rod. The Operator shows up twice.

scene.description: Tim wakes up and moves from the Hospital to the Annex.
Tim moves to the Annex, where Alex is searching for him. The operator appears.

video.title: Session
video.player_summary: Various short pieces of footage, mostly of children watching or making film. 'One day you will understand.

scene.description: totheark shows very old footage of children in school.

video.title: Entry #58
video.player_summary: Tim and Jay go to the abandoned hospital. Hoody is seen and leads Jay to the maintenance tunnel. Jay and Tim leave. Tim shows signs of suspicion and sickness.

scene.description: Jay and Tim discuss going to the Hospital.
Jay and Tim go to the Hospital, and Jay leads Tim to the Annex. Hoody appears and leads them to the Maintenance Tunnel.
Jay and Tim walk back along the Railway and Tim is suspicious of Jay.

video.title: Entry #59
video.player_summary: Tim confronts Jay about the entries on the youtube channel.

scene.description: Tim confronts Jay about the tapes he shared and the visit to the Hospital.

video.title: Reference
video.player_summary: totheark plays back Tim's rant with footage of the maintenance tunnel.

scene.description: totheark recycles footage from Entry #59, then brielfy shows Masky in the Maintenance Tunnel.

video.title: Entry #60
video.player_summary: Jay goes down the maintenance tunnel and finds a gift from Hoody. The Operator chases Jay out.

scene.description: Jay goes back to the Hospital and explores the Annex.
Jay goes into the Maintenance Tunnel and recovers Tim's medical records. The operator chases him out. Someone is walking upstairs.

video.title: Entry #60.5
video.player_summary: Jay reviews the contents of the medical documents found in Entry #60.

scene.description: Jay looks at Tim's medical records.

video.title: observation
video.player_summary: totheark films Tim at home.

scene.description: totheark watches Tim take his medication.

video.title: Entry #61
video.player_summary: Hoody hacks Jay's account and watches Tim have a seizure.

scene.description: Hoody films Tim at home. He sneaks in and takes Tim's medication. Tim returns and has a seizure. When Hoody collects the camera, Tim's 'Masky' jacket is gone.

video.title: Entry #62
video.player_summary: Jay follows Tim into the woods and is attacked by Masky. Tim and Jay work up somewhere unfamiliar.

scene.description: Jay drives to the woods looking for Tim. Masky attacks Jay.
Hoody positions the camera to face Jay.
Jay wakes up inside the Hoody Hut, and Tim wakes up outside. They both head back to Rosswood.

video.title: Isolation
video.player_summary: totheark asks questions about Tim and Jay.

scene.description: Hoody stands outside the Hoody Hut.

video.title: Entry #63
video.player_summary: Jay and Tim talk about teaming up against the operator.

scene.description: Jay and Tim are at Rosswood Park. Jay drives home and Tim walks home.
Jay returns Tim's medical records to him. They agree to go back to Rosswood Park.

video.title: Entry #64
video.player_summary: Jay and Tim explore Rosswood Park looking for answers. Some unexpected things happen with time and space.

scene.description: Jay and Tim return to the Barn at Rosswood Park to search for clues.
Jay and Tim search unsuccessfully for the Hoody Hut.
Jay and Tim go to the Tunnel. Alex calls Jay and tells him to leave. The operator appears and Jay flees.
Jay runs through the woods back to his car, where he sees Tim. Tim drives off without saying a word.

video.title: Display
video.player_summary: totheark tells Jay that Alex is looking for him.

scene.description: totheark shows footage of the Tunnel.
totheark shows a figure at the Lorry parking lot.

video.title: Entry #65
video.player_summary: Tim shares the footage recovered from Entry #64 with Jay.

scene.description: Jay and Tim return to Rosswood Park to search for clues.
Jay and Tim go to the Tunnel. Alex calls Jay and tells him to leave. The operator appears and takes Tim.
Tim gets taken to the Slendyverse by the operator.
Tim sees Jay approach at Rosswood, then drives to the Hopsital Annex.
Tim gives Jay the footage for Entry #65.

video.title: Surveillance
video.player_summary: totheark smashes up some TVs in the woods.

scene.description: totheark recycles some old footage, with new footage from the woods in Rosswood.

video.title: Entry #66
video.player_summary: Jay and Tim head back to the hospital where they find Hoody depositing a tape.

scene.description: Jay and Tim go back to the Annex where Tim explains his past. They follow Hoody, but lose track.

video.title: Entry #67
video.player_summary: Hoody, Tim and Alex come to blows in the hospital.

scene.description: Hoody rescues Tim from the Annex, then waits for Alex to arrive.
Hoody attacks Alex and ties him to a chair. Masky attacks Alex, then Hoody threatens to kill Alex with his own gun. The operator appears and scares Hoody away.

video.title: Entry #67.5
video.player_summary: Jay and Tim decide to move away from Rosswood.

scene.description: Jay and Tim prepare to flee Rosswood.

video.title: Entry #68
video.player_summary: totheark hijacks Jay's youtube account and shows that Alex is chasing Hoody.

scene.description: Hoody is waiting at his home and Alex arrives, chasing Hoody away.
Hoody runs to the Maintenance Tunnel and Alex follows him.

video.title: Decline
video.player_summary: totheark recites a poem.

scene.description: totheark recycles some footage and recites a short poem.

video.title: Entry #69
video.player_summary: Jay and Tim return to some Season 1 location and find some tapes.

scene.description: Jay and Tim return to CollegeTown to look for clues.
Jay and Tim go to the gazebo and swimming pool, looking for clues.
Jay and Tim go to the Red Tower and recover burned tapes from 2006.

video.title: Entry #70
video.player_summary: Footage of Alex driving to the children's park, taken from a tape in the static hole.

scene.description: Alex is driving and Amy calls him. He lies to her about being at home.
Alex goes to the Playground and confronts the operator.

video.title: Entry #71
video.player_summary: Footage of Alex driving to the children's park, taken from a tape in the static hole.

scene.description: Jay goes to Alex's house to collect the tapes. Alex attacks him and dumps his body.

video.title: Entry #72
video.player_summary: Alex gives the tapes to Jay. Then attacks him.

scene.description: Jay and Tim go to Alex's house to investigate. The operator shows up and time skips.
Jay and Tim flee Alex's house but the operator incapacitates them.

video.title: entry #73
video.player_summary: Tim and Jay explore Alex's house and the opeator shows up.

scene.description: Hoody goes to the house in the hospital and finds it in disarray. Hoody takes a gun and realizes there are only a few pills left.
Hoody walks down a street in Rosswood.
Hoody breaks into Tim's house in search of pills. Hoody finds a tape, but leaves it in place, then leaves as someone emerges from the attic.

video.title: Entry #74
video.player_summary: Jay and Tim talk about entry #73.

scene.description: Tim goes to a gas station to get some supplies.
Tim and Jay talk about entry #73 and decide to return.

video.title: Conversion
video.player_summary: totheark asks if Tim or Jay are liars.

scene.description: totheark recycles some more footage

video.title: Entry #75
video.player_summary: Jay and Tim drive to Tim's house. They find Alex's bed in the attic and an address on the back of a photo of Amy. Tim takes the tape from entry #73 but denies taking it. Jay tackles Tim and takes the tape from him, then runs off, telling Tim not to follow.

scene.description: Tim picks Jay up from the doctor's office, where he made an appointment. Jay and Tim drive to Tim's house.
Tim and Jay go to Tim's house and find Alex's bed in the attic. They find an address written on the back of a photo of Amy. Tim takes the tape from entry #73.
Jay confronts Tim about hiding the tape from him. He attacks Tim, takes the tape, then flees.

video.title: Entry #76
video.player_summary: Hoody films Masky carrying Jessica from the hotel, Hoody takes her to the woods. Jessica wakes up to find Alex searching for her. Alex chases off Hoody, and convinces Jessica to follow him to the tunnel, where pulls a gun on her. Jessica stops Alex, then Hoody tackles Alex. Jessica flees, only to find the operator.

scene.description: Masky takes Jessica from the hotel and gives her to Hoody.

Hoody takes Jessica to the woods and she wakes up. Alex is searching with a flashlight, and finds them. Alex threatens Hoody with the gun, Hoody flees. Alex convinces Jessica to go with him to the tunnel, where tries to shoot her. She dazzles him with the gun and attacks him, then Hoody turns up and tackles Alex. Jessica flees and encounters the operator.
Alex takes the gun from Jessica's body. The operator teleports Jessica away. Tim wakes up wearing the mask.

video.title: File
video.player_summary: totheark suggests that Jay should bring a knife to his next encounter.

scene.description: totheark posts a video.

video.title: Entry #77
video.player_summary: Jay confronts Tim, armed with a knife and zip ties. Tim overpowers Jay, ties him up and takes his camera, then drives to the address.

scene.description: Jay goes to Tim's house to confront Tim. He threatens Tim with the knife.
Tim overpowers Jay and takes his knife. He ties Jay up and drives off with his camera.

video.title: Entry #78
video.player_summary: Hoody comes to Tim\\\'s house and frees Jay from his bonds. Jay leaves to go to the address.

scene.description: Hoody comes to Tim's house and frees Jay from his bonds.

video.title: Entry #79
video.player_summary: Jay arrives at the address to find it is a college campus and Tim is already there. Jay confronts Hoody, who runs off. Jay follows Tim into a basement where he finds a room with photos of Alex. Jay watches the basement building from a neighbouring building.

scene.description: Jay drives to the address to find the Benedict campus and Tim's car is there.
Jay explores a building and finds Hoody. He confronts Hoody, who is having a coughing fit. Hoody threatens Jay and runs off.

In pursuit of Hoody, Jay sees Tim. He follows Tim into a basement where he finds a room with photos of Alex in there and a message telling Jay to go to Benedict Hall. Jay cannot get into the Hall, so he waits in an adjacent building.

video.title: Quadrant
video.player_summary: totheark leaves another mysterious message for Jay.

scene.description: totheark recycles some more footage and posts a mystererious message.

video.title: Entry #80
video.player_summary: totheark leaves another mysterious message for Jay.

scene.description: Jay sees Tim flee from Benedict Hall, and goes to investigate.
Jay goes into the basement where he finds Alex with the gun, who then shoots Jay. Jay runs to a room and locks himself in. The operator appears and takes him.
Someone stops Jay's camera from recording. Tim picks up the camera and looks for Jay. He sees Hoody and pursues them, but loses track of them.

video.title: Entry #81
video.player_summary: Tim shares the footage from the chestcam he was wearing in Entry #80. Tim talks to a member of staff at the school and gets entry to Benedict Hall. He sees Alex and flees to his car. He passes out before finding any pills and wakes up hours later, realising his pills have been taken.

scene.description: Tim looks around the Benedict Hall campus, finds a man who tells Tim where Benedict Hall is, but to come back tomorrow. Tim finds Benedict Hall locked and decides to return the next day.
Tim explores the Benedict Hall campus, and Jay follows him. Tim goes into the basement and finds a manhole cover, but he cannot open it. He decides to wait another day.
Tim moves through the sewer, where he sees Hoody move past. Tim finds a way into the basement of Benedict Hall, where he sees Alex. He flees, leaving the door to Benedict Hall open.
After fleeing Benedict Hall, Tim starts to cough and runs to his car. As he searches for his pills he hears a gunshot. He cannot find his pills and blacks out.

video.title: Entry #82
video.player_summary: Tim goes to Jay's car and finds his laptop. He shares the footage of Jay walking to the other side of the tunnel to find a shapeshifting Rosswood Park.

scene.description: Tim washes his face in a restroom. He then walks to Jay's car and finds it unlocked. He looks in the trunk and finds Jay's laptop.

Jay walks though the tunnel to the other side, and finds that the geography of Rosswood Park is changing around him. He calls Tim and leaves a message. The operator appears and Jay has a seizure. Jay flees the area.

video.title: Null
video.player_summary: totheark reminds Tim he is now alone.

scene.description: totheark tells Tim he is alone.

video.title: Entry #83
video.player_summary: Tim finds Hoody in Benedict Campus. The operator shows up and there is a lot of teleporting. Hoody falls from a balcony and Tim teleports to a field.

scene.description: Tim washes finds Hoody in a corridor of Benedict Campus. The operator shows up and Hoody flees. Tim chases him.
Tim chases Hoody and they teleport to various locations.

Tim and Hoody teleport back to Bendict Campus. Hoody falls from a balcony to the ground. Tim takes his pills and a tape, before the operator chases him away. Tim teleports and ends up waking up in a field.

event.name: Tim admitted to hospital
event.title: Tim admitted to hospital
event.description: Tim runs away from home and is found at Rosswood Park. He is admitted to the mental hospital, and is stalked by the operator.

event.title: totheark films Jay

event.title: Jay loses the pills and bullet casing

event.title: Jay quits

event.title: Jay leaves home

event.title: Jay's apartment fire

event.name: Jay receives a tape
event.title: Jay receives a tape
event.description: Someone sends Jay a tape containing Entry #26. (Alex claims he sent the tape in Entry #42.)

event.title: Entry #51 recovered

event.title: Twitpics posted
event.description: The Marble Hornets twitter account gets hijacked and three images get posted on 2010/10/27, 2010/10/31, and 2010/11/16.

event.title: Jay takes hard drive

event.name: Jay locks tapes in safe
event.title: Jay locks tapes in safe
event.description: Jay locks the tapes and external hard drive from the previous seven months in the safe. He keeps the chestcam outside the safe and wears it.

event.name: Jay opens the safe
event.title: Jay opens the safe
event.description: Jay finds the safe combination and recovers the tapes and external hard drive from the seven month gap.

event.name: Tweetpocalypse
event.title: Tweetpocalypse
event.description: Jay is locked out of his youtube account and becomes incoherent on twitter.

event.name: 'Forecast' released
event.title: 'Forecast' released

event.title: Tim tweets from marblehornets
event.description: Tim tweets from the @marblehornets twitter account with the following message: 'This is Tim. Jay gave me the password for this in case I ever need it. He's been kind of out of it since we got away from that house.'

event.title: Tim posts Entry #77

scene.description: Description of scene. (Video title also contains channel name and season.)
scene.title: Video title

event.name: Scene colors
event.title: Scene colors
event.description: Scenes are color coded according to the source of the footage:

event.name: Alex's tapes from 2006
event.title: Alex's tapes from 2006
event.description: Alex gave these tapes to Jay at the of the summer 2006 (as shown in Entry #71.)

event.name: Tapes discoverd by Jay in 2010
event.title: Tapes discoverd by Jay in 2010
event.description: These tapes were found in the safe in Jay's room and were recorded by Jay during the seven month gap.

event.name: Footage from Alex's hard drive
event.title: Footage from Alex's hard drive
event.description: This footage was stolen from Alex at the end of the seven month gap.

event.name: Tim's tapes from 2006
event.title: Tim's tapes from 2006
event.description: Tim gave these tapes to Jay in 2013.

event.name: Tapes found by Jay in 2013
event.title: Tapes found by Jay in 2013
event.description: These tapes were found by Jay and Tim at the Red Tower in 2013. They are sometimes refered to as the 'Amy Tapes'.

event.name: Footage filmed by Jay in real time
event.title: Footage filmed by Jay in real time
event.description: This is any footage filmed by Jay and uploaded as soon as reasonably possible.

event.name: Footage filmed by Tim in real time
event.title: Footage filmed by Tim in real time
event.description: This is any footage filmed by Tim and uploaded as soon as reasonably possible.

event.name: Footage filmed by Jay but shared by Tim
event.title: Footage filmed by Jay but shared by Tim
event.description: This is any footage that Tim took from Jay's laptop.

event.name: totheark footage
event.title: totheark footage
event.description: This is footage shared on the totheark channel, where the cameraperson is unknown.

event.name: Hoody footage
event.title: Hoody footage
event.description: This is footage we know to be filmed by Hoody, regardless of where it is uploaded.

event.name: Other/unknown source
event.title: Other/unknown source
event.description: This includes all other footage, and 'special tapes' that Jay acquired through other means (including Entry #22 and Entry #51.)

event.name: Character lines
event.title: Character lines
event.description: Character lines show which characters are present for each scene. Characters enter the story from the left and on their last appearance, exit on the right with their current status (if known.) Character statuses are: Extant (presumed still alive), Dead, or Missing (in some cases presumed dead.)

event.name: Character colors
event.title: Character colors
event.description: Alex, Jay, and Tim are the primary colors: red, blue, yellow. Other crew from the student movie, Marble Hornets, are shades of green. The operator, totheark, and hoody are shades of gray. All other characters are shades of pink or purple. Each character line enters and leaves a scene in the same order and in the same position (ie Alex is always on the far left, the operator is always on the far right.)

event.name: Locations
event.title: Locations
event.description: There are three categories of locations: CollegeTown, Rosswood and Elsewhere. The position of each scene indicates where the scene was filmed. The position of any other event indicates where that event took place. No assumption is made about the location of totheark, unless the video makes their location explicit.

event.name: Time axis
event.title: Time axis
event.description: The time axis is shown on the left hand side and it is not linear. Major periods of time (epochs) are indicated with red ribbon across the width of the timeline. The series is split into videos, which are then split into scenes, so that a video may appear on the timeline more than once. A video may be split into several successive scenes to indicate an important passage of time.

event.name: Event boxes
event.title: Event boxes
event.description: Important events that happen off camera are shown in blue boxes. Events that lead to the acquisition of more footage are shown in green boxes.
